So when an alien presence is detected in Susan's hometown of Modesto, California -- right before Halloween -- the team is dispatched to investigate. Everything appears normal, right down to the jack-o-lanterns peering out from every doorstep and windowsill. But when Halloween arrives, those innocent-looking carved pumpkins reveal themselves for what they really are mutant aliens. The altered pumpkins then start to implement their fiendish plan to take over Earth. The Monsters are there to combat the mutant gourds and try to smash their wicked scheme!

programme.title: Captain Underpants Special 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Heartbreaking Havoc Of The Haunting Hackaween Special - When Melvin and Krupp conspire to cancel Halloween, George and Harold need to remind their parents why Halloween was fun in the first place. But Melvin catches wind of their plan and uses his Inanimaniatator 2000 to turn the kids’ haunted house into real horrors! After summoning Captain Underpants to fight the monsters off, the boys find that Krupp and Melvin have gone one step further. Halloween isn't just cancelled - it's now ILLEGAL! George and Harold team up with their friends and hack their favorite holiday, creating Hack-a-ween! They’ll wear disguises instead of costumes, carve cabbages instead of pumpkins, and get snacks instead of candy. The new holiday is a hit! But when Melvin fights back, George and Harold realize that in order to beat him, they may ultimately have to make peace with him.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep21
programme.desc: Night Of The White Bone Demon - In a giant sea battle, Po and the Kids manage to escape the pursuing police to make it to Volcano island and get some answers. Empress Xiao begins learning how to defend herself.

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep23
programme.desc: Ladies Night - Khepra, leader of the Cat Council, takes Cleo, Akila and Callie on a "Ladies' Night Out" at the arcade. Cleo hates it until Khepra picks a fight with some aliens. Then at least there's kicking.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On S2 Ep47
programme.desc: Friend Matching/Trolly Tales 3 - When a friend-matching quiz Poppy surreptitiously gives the Trolls reveals that Sky and Guy are a near perfect match, she sets out to make them friends! But her attempts to foster a relationship keep backfiring./Branch and Poppy try to entertain Trolls Village’s babies with a series of nursery rhymes. But, stalling for time, they expand each into a distinct, Trolls-y story.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep47
programme.desc: King Julien: Superstar! - Julien, Clover, Mort and Maurice become music sensations overnight, but the band breaks up over Julien and Clover's non-stop fighting

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep21
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Problematic Pandemonium Of The Punishing Plungerina - After helping George and Harold make a comic featuring the heroine Plungerina, Erica asserts that Plungerina could be better that Captain Underpants. To prove her wrong, the boys decide to actually create the villain in the comic and then have Captain Underpants save the day. Unfortunately, Krupp - and therefore Captain Underpants - is away at a principals' convention.There's no one to save them...until a real life Plungerina saves tthe day! But who is really Plungerina?

programme.title: Boss Baby Back In Business S1 Ep21
programme.desc: Plushythingy - When Frederic Estes creates the cutest plushy ever that is the hottest toy in town, the field team must destroy the last remaining one but are powerless against its cuteness

programme.desc: Spell - As he tries to restore the magic spell that will protect San Lorenzo, Puss accidentally brings Artephius's macramé owl shop to life.

programme.desc: Outbreak/ Ancient Greek Games - Sherman accidentally finds the cure for a prehistoric bird flu turning everyone blue; Zeus's team of titans face off against a gawky geek squad.

programme.desc: Edge Of Disaster Pt 1 - When Ruffnut is captured by Dragon Hunters, it's up to Astrid and Tuffnut to defend Dragon's Edge from the invading Dragon Hunter army Dragon's Edge from the invading Dragon Hunter army

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Rupert And The Cloud Shepherd - Rupert, Ping Pong, Bill and Ming help the Cloud Shepherd find some missing clouds that have sneaked away to play. But how can the friends get them back up into the sky?

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Rupert And The Magic Carpet - When Ming gets stuck up a tree, Rupert, Ping Pong and Bill try to rescue her but, thanks to Edward's mistakes, they all get stuck too. Can Edward overcome his fear of heights and save them?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep5
programme.desc: Zebby'S Snack Time - Zebby likes to have a snack when she is feeling tired. Raa Raa thinks this is a great idea and decides to join his friend. Except he thinks they should have their snack in the perfect place… but everywhere they try is just too noisy… I wonder why that could be?!

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep6
programme.desc: Finding Noisy - Raa Raa gets carried away when collecting fun noisy objects in the jungle with his friends. Raa Raa wants to keep everything he finds for himself, but soon discovers that his collection isn't much fun with nobody to share it with.

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep5
programme.desc: Postman Pat’S Pancake Party - Pat must deliver eggs, milk, flour and butter to Greendale for the annual Pancake Race. But when Michael mixes all the ingredients together, Pat finds that he instead has to deal with a mixing bowl full to the brim with pancake mix... Meanwhile in Greendale, Sara's attempts at pancake-tossing aren't going well and she soon loses her pancake under the wheels of PC Selby's car. Even worse, Ted Glen's amazing Pancake Machine has run out of mix so Sara won't be able to run the race unless Pat can get to Greendale on time... But Pat gets waylaid by Alf's cows and the pancake mix ends up all over the road. Pat hurries back to Pencaster but Michael now only has butter and flour so Pat has to go and get eggs from Nisha and even some milk from Rosie the goat! With the race about to start, Pat arrives just in time with all the ingredients necessary for Ted to make Sara a fresh pancake. SDS Mission accomplished!

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep6
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Runaway Remote - Pat doesn't realise today's Special Delivery, a super all-in-one remote control, is quite as powerful as it is! As Jess falls asleep on the buttons, machines all around Pencaster start going haywire. Waiting for the remote, Charlie and Julian are installing a futuristic 'Shop a Bot 3000' robot sales assistant for Mrs Goggins, but they make the mistake of turning it on before the controller arrives. Pat struggles to make his delivery before the shop robot does too much damage!

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep57
programme.desc: King Stingo - Aunt Tulip has lost Grubby again. When Stingo finds him, he asks to be made King as a reward. It isn't long before he has gone too far and the tots are all fed up with his demands. Can Fifi get life in the garden back to normal?

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep58
programme.desc: Hide And Seek - The tots are playing hide and seek and the winner will get Fifi's delicious jam tarts. Who will win, Stingo and Slugsy are sure it will be them!

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Escape From Azka-Bash - Dennis must escape detention and Bash Street School to make the Beanotown Brawny Bean Race before Walter wins it! With the help of a note placed in his desk, he must sneak past Mrs Creecher and make a run for it – unless the mysterious note giver stops him first!

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Griller Thriller - Dennis’ ultimate hero, Grizzly Griller, plans on trekking to the source of the River Beano, broadcasting the treacherous path on live TV. Dennis introduces him to his pet hamster, Galahad – only to discover they are his biggest fear! Grizzly is so torn up that Dennis must disguise himself as his hero and go in his place!

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep29
programme.desc: The Hunted - Lotor seizes the opportunity and lures the Paladins to Thayserix, a mysterious gas planet

programme.desc: Snow Dream - Bubu has fixed Froga's barometer and everyone is surprised when it says there will be snow today (on a warm summer day!). Everyone is excited, Bubu wants to make to make a five-seater sled! He gets upset, when they realize it was a false forecast!

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Marvelous Moustaches - Barbazoo collects photos of moustached celebrities. Unfortunately, it's impossible to find the last one: Charles Horseshoe-Furlip. He suspects a conspiracy...

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep101
programme.desc: The Barbapapa Tree / The Barbababies' birthday - Barbapapa and Barbamama return to the tree they were born under. It's in bad condition. They must rescue it quickly without disturbing the nearby animals. // It's the Barbababies's birthday. They all want to do something different with Barbapapa!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep304
programme.desc: The Ghost of the Living Room - Josh and Blue are throwing a Halloween party and all our friends are in costume! Blue's a unicorn, Magenta's a mouse, but who's that mysterious, silly ghost in the Living Room? We'll play Blue's Clues to figure it out!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S01 Ep119
programme.desc: Spooky Costume Party with Blue - It's a spooky Halloween at the Blue's Clues house - Blue's dressed up as a fish, but Magenta can't decide what to wear! We play Blue's Clues to figure out what costume Magenta should wear.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep601
programme.desc: Werewolves of Bubbledon! - On Halloween eve in the foggy town of Bubbledon, everyone is nervous because there's a werewolf on the loose! Monster Detectives Molly, Gil and Dr. Pupson are on the case, but will they find the critter before Halloween is cancelled?

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S04 Ep412
programme.desc: Trick-or-Treat, Mr. Grumpfish! - Happy Halloween! Molly, Gil, and the rest of the Guppies are picking out costumes, trick-or-treating, and turning their classroom into a haunted house! It'll have to be really spooky if they want to scare Mr. Grumpfish!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep225
programme.desc: Paddington and the Halloween Mystery / Paddington's Campfire Stories - It's Halloween and there are strange goings on in Windsor Gardens - will Paddington solve the spooky mystery? // Whose story will earn them a camp fire story telling badge and will any of them be too scary!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep120
programme.desc: Paddington and Halloween / Paddington has an Autumn Wish - It's Halloween and Paddington goes Treat or Treating with Jonathan and Judy around Windsor gardens but Mr. Curry does not want to join in...or does he? // Why do the trees lose their leaves? It does not happen in Peru. Paddington discovers Autumn.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep111
programme.desc: Baby Shark's Haunted Halloween - Baby Shark must overcome his one big fear when he meets a real life ghostfish!

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep107
programme.desc: The Wolf of Halloween - For Halloween, the Barbababies play wolf and have fun scaring each other.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep119
programme.desc: The Mysterious Island / Mystery of the Vam-Pirates - On Halloween night, Santiago and his crew must retrieve the legendary Treasure Treats from La Isla Misteriosa. // Santiago encounters a real-life vampire! The two must team up to rescue their crews.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep110
programme.desc: Pups and the Ghost Pirate - It’s Halloween! Capt’n Turbot has decorated an old wreck as a pirate ship for a town party. When the ship mysteriously heads out to sea captained by a "ghost" Ryder and the Paw Patrol must save the ship and discover the ghost!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep623
programme.desc: Pups Save the Phantom of the Frog Pond - A spooky sound forces frogs from their home. The pups must bring them home and solve the mystery of the frog pond phantom.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep319
programme.desc: Pups Get Growing - Fertilizer causes Yumi’s crops to sprout huge veggies, so Ryder and the Paw Patrol must corral the stampeding produce!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep217
programme.desc: Pups and the Ghost Cabin - First Rubble's lunch disappears, then Jake's lunchbox walks away! Could it be a ghost?!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep625
programme.desc: The Great Halloween Race - It's Halloween in Axle City, and Blaze, AJ, and all their friends are racing in The Great Halloween Race! First one across the finish line wins the biggest, tastiest goody bag ever!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S02 Ep203
programme.desc: Truck or Treat - It’s Halloween in Axle City, and Blaze, AJ, and all of their friends are excited to “Truck or Treat.” But when Crusher tries to steal all of their candy, his plan goes awry, and he sends their treats far away from Axle City.

programme.title: Butterbean's Café S01 Ep114
programme.desc: A Bean for Halloween! - It's Halloween! The Bean Team is trying to prep for their big party, but spooky things keep happening around the café. Cricket is convinced it's a ghost until she realizes it's actually a cute kitty with wings!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep110
programme.desc: Medievel Tides - When Baby Shark and friends are playing knights and royals, Vola wants to be more than just a princess.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep804
programme.desc: Pups Stop the Cheetah - When the Cheetah swipes the Paw Patroller to fulfill her nefarious plan to destroy the jungle and build the cheating-est racetrack ever, the Paw Patrol must get a brand vehicle and stop her!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep220
programme.desc: Paddington's Treasure Hunt / Paddington's Taste of Italy - Jonathan & Paddington find a treasure map in a bottle on the lake! Judy & Toq also find a treasure map, but who will find the treasure first? // Mr. Gruber has always wanted to go to Italy & Paddington sets about helping his friend achieve his dream!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep508
programme.desc: International Day - Peppa and her friends at playgroup dress up in clothes from different countries all over the world, but then have an argument.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep509
programme.desc: The Rainy Day Game - Daddy teaches Peppa and George a fun game to play while they wait inside for the rain to stop.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep510
programme.desc: Mummy Rabbit's Bump - Everyone is excited when Mummy Rabbit arrives with some big news-she is pregnant! Will it be one baby or twins?

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep159
programme.desc: The Stay Over - When Anna and Froga invite Ron to take a nap on their couch, they are surprised by his loud snores. They try everything they can to get him to stop (without disturbing his nap) and when they try to get Bubu's help, but Ron snores louder and louder!!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep160
programme.desc: Snow Dream - Bubu has fixed Froga's barometer and everyone is surprised when it says there will be snow today (on a warm summer day!). Everyone is excited, Bubu wants to make to make a five-seater sled! He gets upset, when they realize it was a false forecast!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S02 Ep215
programme.desc: Blue's Big Neighborhood Adventure - Josh and Blue are Neighborhood Heroes, helping everyone they meet as they explore our neighborhood. We play Blue's Clues to figure out where Blue wants to go in the neighborhood and make very important stop to make pizza with Mr. Oregano!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep418
programme.desc: Pups Save a City Kitty / Pups Save a Cloud Surfer - Cali gets lost in the woods. // Daring Danny X's harness loosens while kite-surfing.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep601
programme.desc: Pups Save a Freighter - Daring Danny is locked out of the lighthouse Turbot left him to look after. Now a freighter is headed straight for Seal Island!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep8
programme.desc: The Big Day Out Badge - Duggee takes the Squirrels and their parents on an exciting mystery trip to a surprising destination, where they learn they can make anywhere special and earn their Big Day Out badges in the process!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep9
programme.desc: The Tree Badge - Duggee helps the Squirrels learn about all the amazing things trees do for the creatures who live amongst them, and earn their tree badges in the process!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep10
programme.desc: The Cheese Badge - Duggee and the Squirrels go on a mission to contain an outbreak when Roly inadvertently goes on the run with the world's smelliest cheese, earning their Cheese badges in the process.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) Ep41
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Waterspout Wipeout - A race between Xuli, Lars and Glitch gets serious when a tornado hits the Academy Island.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) Ep42
programme.desc: Floating Farms, Bangladesh - Glitch's trip to a funky floating farm becomes a rescue mission on a fast-flowing river.

programme.title: Kit and Pup (S1) Ep24
programme.desc: Over and Under - Kit and Pup are out and about. Can you see who is going over the bridge and who is going under the bridge? Kit and Pup are also helping the little investigators pass toys over and under to get from one side of the room to the other.

programme.title: Yakka Dee (S5) Ep18
programme.desc: Blanket - Dee encourages a friend to say 'blanket' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure. We see lots of different blankets - a blue blanket, a baby blanket, a woolly blanket and a picnic blanket!

programme.title: Tom And Jerry Tales Ep4A/Ep17A/Ep7B/Ep20B/Ep10C/Ep23C/Ep11A/Ep24A
programme.desc: Digital Dilemma/Adventures in Penguin Sitting/Beach Bully Bingo/League of Cats/Polar Peril/Snow Mouse/Din-O-Sores/DJ Jerry - When the antenna of Tom's homemade computer is struck by lightning, Tom and Jerry are zapped inside the computer.

programme.title: Unikitty Ep86/Ep46/Ep10/Ep34/Ep71
programme.desc: Guardian Of The Unikingdom/Kitty & Hawk/Wishing Well/Big Pup, Little Problem/Welcome To The Unikingdom - Hawkodile insists the Unikingdom is more dangerous than it looks, and sets out to prove it by taking his friends on bodyguard patrol.

programme.title: The Powerpuff Girls Ep106/Ep141/Ep215/Ep130/Ep171
programme.desc: Bye Bye, Bellum/Find Your Bliss/Our Brand is Chaos/The Big Sleep/Tooth Or Consequences - The Mayor becomes dependent on the Powerpuff Girls after Ms. Bellum departs, leaving the girls so busy, they hire the dangerous Bianca Bikini as his new assistant!

programme.title: Ben 10 Ep131/Ep170/Ep210/Ep232/Ep266
programme.desc: The Beast Inside/Past Aliens Present/Cirque-Us/I Don't Like You/Buktu The Future - Dr. Animo has made a scary transformation and found a way to release the very dangerous animal nature of humans, including Max's life-long friend!

programme.title: Chowder Ep5B/Ep21A/Ep16A/Ep47A
programme.desc: The Cinnamini Monster/The Arborians/Chowder Loses His Hat/Weekend at Schnitzel's - When Chowder discovers a lonely monster in the forest, the whole gang soon has to find a way to escape from their emotionally needy new 'friend'.

programme.title: Inspector Gadget Ep205B/Ep210B/Ep215B/Ep220B/Ep226B

Gadget mistakes a baboon for a helpful ally.

programme.title: Foster's Home For Imaginary Friends Ep17/Ep6

programme.title: Be Cool Scooby-Doo! Ep1/Ep2

programme.title: Be Cool Scooby-Doo! Ep28/Ep33

programme.title: Be Cool Scooby-Doo! Ep8/Ep15

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and “accepted wisdom” to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won’t find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today’s world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from “Prove That Climate Change Exists” to “Who Will Win the Race to Space”. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.title: Razor
programme.desc: CGTN's brand new science and technology show, covering cutting edge developments from all over the world. RAZOR will show you the world's most powerful laser and the world's smallest anti-cancer treatment. It will take you from the weird world of quantum computing to the boundaries of the cosmos. An international team of reporters will follow the guidance of Occam's Razor - the principle that the simplest explanation is the best one. RAZOR will show that we are already ""living in the future"!

programme.title: Back Roads - French Island, VIC S8 Ep13
programme.desc: Guest Presenter Lisa Millar goes on an adventure to Victoria's French Island. World renowned as a haven for many bird, animal and plant species - it is a Noah's ark of diversity.

programme.title: Inside Central Station S1 Ep4

programme.title: Australia's Favourite Tree S1 Ep2

programme.title: Art Works S2 Ep18

programme.title: Anh's Brush With Fame - Tara Moss S6 Ep6

programme.title: Compass - Beyond The Bill S36 Ep3

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep3
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Kattar vs. Allen
programme.desc: Prelims - With three consecutive Fight of the Night awards, Calvin Kattar has established himself as a must see in thestacked featherweight division, but the next goal on his hit list is earning a world title shot, and beating Britishstandout Arnold Allen in the five-round main event of UFC Fight Night on October 30 at the APEX in Las Vegaswill get him closer to the top. That’s not an easy task for the New Englander, though, as Allen is on one ofthe most impressive runs in the sport, an 11-fight winning streak that includes UFC victories over the likes of Gilbert Melendez, Sodiq Yusuff and Dan Hooker

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Kattar vs. Allen
programme.desc: Main Event - With three consecutive Fight of the Night awards, Calvin Kattar has established himself as a must see in thestacked featherweight division, but the next goal on his hit list is earning a world title shot, and beating Britishstandout Arnold Allen in the five-round main event of UFC Fight Night on October 30 at the APEX in Las Vegaswill get him closer to the top. That’s not an easy task for the New Englander, though, as Allen is on one ofthe most impressive runs in the sport, an 11-fight winning streak that includes UFC victories over the likes of Gilbert Melendez, Sodiq Yusuff and Dan Hooker
